amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language which establishes a point of order against legislation containing an unfunded Federal mandate and provide instead that a point of order may only apply against legislation containing an unfunded mandate for which CBO has not published an estimate of the cost of the mandate.
amendment.purpose: An amendment specifying that a point of order may only apply against legislation containing an unfunded mandate for which CBO has not published an estimate of the cost of the mandate. (Text of the amendment was printed as amendment No. 34 in the Congressional Record of January 19, 1995.).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beilenson amendment (A057) Failed by recorded vote: 138 - 291 (Roll no. 78).
